Title: Exit Time
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Tom Smuts (written for television by), Tom Bernardo (written for television by), Joe Gonzalez (story editor), Tom Bernardo (staff writer)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Sarah Clarke
Plot: Deputy Chief Irving takes full measures in the wake of tragedy. Bosch finds himself in an unexpected alliance, which leads to a startling discovery. Eleanor seeks an advantage with the FBI....
